code: @Test public void testEchoOk() throws Exception {     String out = template.requestBody("direct:echo", "Claus", String.class).     assertEquals("Claus Claus", out). }

@Test public void testEchoKabom() throws Exception {     try {         template.requestBody("direct:echo", "Kabom", String.class).         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (RuntimeCamelException e) {         assertIsInstanceOf(MyEchoRuntimeException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals("Damn something went wrong", e.getCause().getMessage()).     } }
@Test public void testRouteOk() throws Exception {     String out = template.requestBody("direct:start", "Claus", String.class).     assertEquals("Claus Claus", out). }

@Test public void testRouteKabom() throws Exception {     try {         template.requestBody("direct:start", "Kabom", String.class).         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (RuntimeCamelException e) {         assertIsInstanceOf(MyEchoRuntimeException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals("Damn something went wrong", e.getCause().getMessage()).     } }
